evidence.text: MOTION for Preliminary Injunction by ANDREW H WARREN.

extracted.value: On August 17, 2022, Andrew H. Warren filed a Motion for Preliminary Injunction, asking the court to grant a preliminary injunction to block the defendant’s actions.

evidence.text: MOTION to Intervene with Attachments by Scott Huminski.

extracted.value: On August 22, 2022, Scott Huminski filed a Motion to Intervene, requesting permission to intervene in the case.

evidence.text: NOTICE Joint Notice of Compliance and Proposed Schedule by ANDREW H WARREN

extracted.value: On August 22, 2022, Andrew H. Warren filed a Notice Joint Notice of Compliance and Proposed Schedule, asking the court to approve a compliance schedule.

evidence.text: MOTION TO INTERVENE (DOCUMENT TITLED AMENDED COMPLAINT OF PETITIONER). (rcb)

extracted.value: On August 25, 2022, the defendant filed a Motion to Intervene (Document titled Amended Complaint of Petitioner) with the court to intervene based on the amended complaint.

evidence.text: UNOPPOSED MOTION BY FORMER PROSECUTORS, ATTORNEYS GENERAL, JUDGES, UNITED STATES ATTORNEYS AND FEDERAL OFFICIALS, AND CURRENT AND FORMER LAW ENFORCEMENT OFFICIALS AND LEADERS FOR LEAVE TO FILE AMICUS CURIAE BRIEF. (Attachments: # 1 Amicus Brief) (WARREN,

extracted.value: On August 26, 2022, former prosecutors, attorneys general, judges, U.S. attorneys, federal officials, and law‑enforcement officials filed an Unopposed Motion for Leave to File an Amicus Curiae Brief, asking the court to allow their brief.

evidence.source_document: Defendant's Consolidated Motion to Dismiss and Memorandum of Law, and Response in Opposition to Motion for Preliminary Injunction
evidence.text: DEFENDANT’S CONSOLIDATED MOTION TO DISMISS AND MEMORANDUM OF LAW, AND RESPONSE IN OPPOSITION TO MOTION FOR PRELIMINARY INJUNCTION

extracted.value: Defendant Andrew H. Warren filed a consolidated motion to dismiss and memorandum of law, and response in opposition to motion for preliminary injunction on September 2, 2022, asking the court to dismiss the case and deny the plaintiff’s motion for preliminary injunction.

evidence.text: Defendant’s Motion for Protective Order

extracted.value: Defendant Andrew H. Warren filed a motion for protective order on September 2, 2022, seeking to prevent the plaintiff from subpoenaing Sheriff Lemma and to protect confidential information.

evidence.text: Defendant’s Motion for Section 1292(b) Certification

extracted.value: Defendant Andrew H. Warren filed a motion for Section 1292(b) certification on September 26, 2022, requesting the court to certify its order denying the motion to dismiss for interlocutory appeal.

evidence.source_document: Emergency Motion to Quash Subpoena and/or for Protective Order and Memorandum of Law
evidence.text: EMERGENCY1 MOTION TO QUASH SUBPOENA AND/OR FOR PROTECTIVE ORDER AND MEMORANDUM OF LAW

extracted.value: Defendant Andrew H. Warren filed an emergency motion to quash subpoena and/or for protective order and memorandum of law on November 23, 2022, requesting the court to quash the subpoena to Sheriff Lemma.

evidence.source_document: Motion to Compel Compliance with Discovery Obligations
evidence.text: MOTION TO COMPEL COMPLIANCE WITH DISCOVERY OBLIGATIONS

extracted.value: Plaintiff Andrew H. Warren filed a motion to compel compliance with discovery obligations on October 16, 2022, seeking the defendant’s cooperation in producing documents.

evidence.text: ORDER COMPELLING DISCOVERY

extracted.value: The court issued an order compelling discovery on October 17, 2022, granting the motion to compel and requiring the defendant to produce specified documents.

evidence.source_document: Order Denying the Motion for § 1292(b) Certification
evidence.text: ORDER DENYING THE MOTION FOR § 1292(b) CERTIFICATION

extracted.value: The court denied the motion for § 1292(b) certification on October 4, 2022, rejecting the request to certify the order for interlocutory appeal.

evidence.text: PRETRIAL ORDER

extracted.value: The court issued a pretrial order on November 29, 2022, setting the trial date and addressing motions to quash subpoenas and bar the plaintiff from calling the defendant as a witness.

evidence.text: PLAINTIFF'S MOTION FOR PRELIMINARY INJUNCTION

extracted.value: Plaintiff Andrew H. Warren filed a motion for preliminary injunction on [date not provided], seeking to enjoin the defendant from certain actions.

evidence.source_document: Defendant's Motion to Bar Compelled Testimony
evidence.text: DEFENDANT’S MOTION TO BAR COMPELLED TESTIMONY

extracted.value: Defendant Andrew H. Warren filed a motion to bar compelled testimony, requesting the court to prohibit compelled testimony.

evidence.text: Case 4:22-cv-00302-RH-MAF Document 1 Filed 08/17/22

extracted.value: Complaint filed by Andrew H. Warren on 08/17/22, seeking suspension of Governor Ron Desantis over alleged improper actions.
